problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,∠BAD=130°,∠B=∠D=90°,在BC、CD上分别找一点M、N,使三角形AMN周长最小时,则∠AMN+∠ANM的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, ∠BAD = N_0, ∠B = ∠D = N_1, find a point M and N on BC and CD respectively, so that when the perimeter of the triangle AMN is the smallest, then the degree of ∠AMN + ∠ANM is ( )
raw_answer: 解:作A关于BC和CD的对称点A',A",连接A'A",交BC于M,交CD于N,∵∠DAB=130°∴∠AA'M+∠A"=50°∵∠MA'A=∠MAA',∠NAD=∠A",且∠MA'A+∠MAA'=∠AMN,∠NAD+∠A"=∠ANM∴∠AMN+.∠ANM=∠MA'A+∠MAA'+∠NAD+∠A"=2(∠AA'M+∠A")=2×50°=100°,故选C.
